lead_paragraph: A 28-year-old man carrying two guns, ammunition and a Quran was arrested at a hotel in Disneyland Paris, adding to security fears in France.

byline.contributor: Daphné Anglès reported from Paris, and Hannah Olivennes from London.
byline.original: By DAPHNÉ ANGLÈS and HANNAH OLIVENNES

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; France: Man Carrying Guns Arrested at Disney Hotel
headline.main: Armed Man Arrested at Disneyland Paris

snippet: A 28-year-old man carrying two guns, ammunition and a Quran was arrested at a hotel in Disneyland Paris, adding to security fears in France.
abstract: French authorities arrest man at Disney’s Hotel New York near Disneyland Paris in Marne-la-Vallee after routine security check found guns and ammunition in his luggage.
